onto the frontfoot and pushes it away to on-side but short mid-wicket across quickly to field it
tossed on leg, sweeps it away to square leg for a run, his using the sweep to good effect here
short of good length with some spin on it, onto the backfoot and pushes it back to the bowler
onto the backfoot and nudges it to the bowler
tossed on leg, nudges it with soft hands to short fine leg for a run
tossed up, goes for a sweep again on the full but gets hit on the pads
tossed on leg, sweeps it and gets a fine nick through the keeper's leg for a boundary and he reaches his fifty with that
onto the backfoot and pushes it back to the bowler
tossed up, onto the knee and swept away to square leg for a run, gilson into the act of sweeping aswell
tossed on leg, pokes his bat to it and gets it away to short fine leg
tossed up, driven straight back to the bowler
tossed on leg, sweeps it away to square leg for a boundary
tossed on leg, goes for a reverse sweep but gets beaten and beats the keeper aswell down to the boundary
quicker outside off, onto the frontfoot to sweep but misses it
tossed up, sweeps it away to square leg for a run
onto the backfoot and does a defense
tossed up, pushes it to short mid-wicket
onto the backfoot and blocks it
tossed up, onto the backfoot and gets a inside edge onto the pads for nothing
tossed up, takes a stride down and manages to get some bat on it to survive a lbw shout
onto the frontfoot and nudges it to short fine leg for a quick run
tossed up, drives it to short mid-wicket
tossed on middle, goes for a drive towards long-on but short mid-wicket across to field it
outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it to sweeper fielder for a easy run
flighted up, driven down to long-on for a run
looped up, goes for a drive but it beats him with the spin and just away from the off-stump
onto the frontfoot and pushes it to short mid-wicket
looped outside off, onto the frontfoot and blocks it
looped up, onto the frontfoot and pushes it to point
quicker ball but down the leg and wide given
onto the frontfoot an does a defense
looped on off, lets it spin and pushes it late away to thirdman for a run
short ball aimed into him, goes for a pull and gets a top edge away to deep fine leg for a six, fielder got under it and it went just over him
short ball and it goes way over the batsman head for a wide
good length on middle, gets his front leg across and slog sweeps it over square leg for a six
slow ball on off, onto the frontfoot and driven to cover fielder
full on middle, drives it firmly on the rise to the right of mid-off for a quick run
onto the backfoot and does a defense
good length on off, pushes it to cover fielder of the backfoot
looped on middle, driven down to long-on for a run
quicker and flat on off, looks to defend but got beaten as it span away
looped on middle, onto the backfoot and does a defense
looped on leg, sweeps it firmly away to square leg for a couple
looped outside off,onto the frontfoot and does a defense
looped outside off, onto the frontfoot for a drive but beaten, loud appeal for caught behind but not out is the call
tossed outside off, onto the backfoot and pushes it past point for a run
tossed on leg, nudges it away to mid-wicket for a run
tossed outside off, cuts it late and past the point fielder for a boundary
onto the frontfoot and does a defense
outside off, tries to cut it late and manages on but to the fielder at point
tossed on middle, opens the face of the bat and pushes it past point for a run
looped outside off, looks to defend but beaten
looped on off, onto the frontfoot and defend again and gets beaten
looped outside off, takes a stride down to push it to point area for a run
looped outside off, pushes it to point
looped on middle, pushes it to cover fielder
looped on middle, nudges it to short mid-wicket
tossed on off, spins back sharp but under control of the stirling as he pushes it down to long-on for a run
onto the frontfoot and pushes it to short mid-wicket
tossed on off, reverse sweeps it firmly past point for a boundary
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
tossed on middle, flicks it towards long-on but finds the short mid-wicket fielder instead for a soft dismissal
tossed outside off, looks to drive it but doesn't connect well and cut on its way by cover fielder
down the leg and sweeps it but to the short fine leg fielder
tossed outside off, goes for a sweep and gets struck on the pads, they get across for a leg-bye
tossed up, onto the frontfoot and driven back to the right of the bowler, who picks it up and throws at the stump and hits but he was always home safely
onto the frontfoot and does a defense
outside off, pushes it to point fielder
tossed up, looks to defend and gets a edge but on the bounce to slip fielder
onto the frontfoot and driven down to long-on for a run
tossed on middle, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
tossed up, pushes it back to the bowler
tossed on the pads, nudges it to the on-side
tossed on middle, onto the frontfoot and does a defense
tossed up, onto the backfoot and does a defense
short ball, gets behind it nicely and does a defense
short again, tries the cheeky cut but misses on it
short ball again, moves away out of off-stump and pulls it down to fine leg for a boundary
short ball on middle, moves across and hooks it away to fine leg for a six
short outside off this time, comes down and goes with flow, slaps it over covers for a huge six, hes racing towards his century with the wins also coming along
short ball on off, drags it to mid-wicket to reach his century in style, superb batting display by stirling. he has smashed shapoor all around the ground

onto the frontfoot and does a defense
